text: Rudnitsky of Rudnitski (feminine: Rudnitskaya) is a transliteration of the Russian-language spelling of the Polish toponymic surname Rudnicki. The surname may refer to: *Jon Rudnitsky *Maria Rudnitskaya, Russian Soviet realist painter, graphic artist, and art teacher *Jaroslav Rudnycky, Ukrainian-Canadian folklorist *Ancestral surname of Paul Rudd (1969-), American actor Category:Russian-language surnames Category:Toponymic surnames Category:Ukrainian-language surnames
title: Rudnitsky
